Class NullServerCapabilities

    public final class NullServerCapabilities
extends Object
implements ServerCapabilities

      • isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported

        public boolean isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported()
        Description copied from interface: ServerCapabilities
        In newer versions of Acrolinx you can flag admitted terms separately from deprecated and valid terms. You can also customize the name of the admitted term status.
        Specified by:
        isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported in interface ServerCapabilities
        Returns:
        true, if the server supports the customized admitted term state
